theoryText: Many fans believe that Vivi will eventually rejoin the Straw Hats in the final saga, as she has always been treated as an honorary crew member. With Vivi returning to the story in recent chapters, theories suggest she might finally sail with them permanently.
author: Multiple Reddit and forum users

theoryText: Bon Clay's recurring sacrifices for Luffy (in Arabasta and later in Impel Down) make many fans believe he deserves to join the Straw Hats. However, counter-theories argue that his story arc is perfect as is, with his role as a loyal friend and ally being more meaningful than official crew membership.
author: One Piece community discussions

theoryText: The 100 million bounty threshold is particularly significant because it marks entry into a new tier of pirates. Some fans theorize this was the World Government's way of signaling that Luffy had become a serious threat by defeating a Warlord, foreshadowing the escalating conflict between Luffy and the government.
author: One Piece analysis community

theoryText: King Cobra's bathhouse scene where he says 'there is no king' while naked is theorized to foreshadow his later importance in the story and his knowledge of world secrets. Fans point to this scene as evidence of his humble and wise nature that makes him different from other world leaders.
author: One Piece theorists
